title: 2000k+ Ping Spikes
body:
Whenever I normally play, I usually have 30-40 ping. Today I experienced 2 games with over 2000k+ so I ran a traceroute test:

The 4th step had over 2000 ms.

replies.body:
Hmmmm that kinda sounds like some dreaded packet loss. I say dreaded mostly because there's not a lot you can usually do to fix it since it mostly happens from how your ISP is routing your connection to our servers. Let's test for that before jumping to conclusions though.

Grab the network logs from that game and have our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) scan it. Take a screenshot of what it gives and post it back here so I can take a look!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=6matqbcR,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-19T02:41:35.240+0000)
>
> Hmmmm that kinda sounds like some dreaded packet loss. I say dreaded mostly because there's not a lot you can usually do to fix it since it mostly happens from how your ISP is routing your connection to our servers. Let's test for that before jumping to conclusions though.
> 
> Grab the network logs from that game and have our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) scan it. Take a screenshot of what it gives and post it back here so I can take a look!

No offense to you, but this issue seems to be more then just simple packet loss, i mean i have been having similar problems with no packet loss when i ran a Tracer and it was my 3rd step with 822ms after 3-5min of running the test during a Normal draft 5 players vs. 5 players.
